about_the_game:
The additional wallpapers pack for the game Guilty Me offers players a stunning selection of exclusive and stunning images that can be used as wallpapers on their devices. Complementing the game's unique and stylized atmosphere, this additional content allows players to immerse themselves even further in the captivating universe of Guilty Me.

Each wallpaper included in the pack has been carefully designed to capture the essence and aesthetic of the game. Players can expect a wide range of styles and themes, from vibrant and colorful visuals to darker and mysterious settings. Each image is richly detailed and displays the stunning visual quality that Guilty Me is known for.

name: Guilty Me - Wallpaper pack
short_description: The additional wallpapers pack for the game Guilty Me offers players a stunning selection of exclusive and stunning images that can be used as wallpapers on their devices. Complementing the game's unique and stylized atmosphere.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
